long_description: The Osprey Karve 6 snow pack comfortably hauls the essentials you need to pursue the wild experience that starts where the chairlift ends. The Osprey Karve 6 ski pack carries a snowboard vertically or skis diagonally. Zippered pocket carries goggles and a shovel blade; external sleeve secures snow probes and a shovel handle. EVA foam harness features an insulated hydration sleeve and an adjustable sternum strap (hydration reservoir not included). Snow-shedding fabric reduces snow buildup when the pack sits in the snow; fully padded front panel reduces wear from ski edges. Closeout.
short_description: The Osprey Karve 6 snow pack comfortably hauls the essentials you need to pursue the wild experience that starts where the chairlift ends.
